Home.Title: Hello! I'm Tiago, software developer.
Home.Description: I'm a math teacher and I've been studying Javascript, Node.js, React and Typescript for 1.5 years!

About.DescriptionOne: I'm Tiago, I study Typescript and PHP since I decided to leave the Magisterium.
About.DescriptionTwo: And it all started with a game of tic-tac-toe!
About.DescriptionThree: I felt challenged when trying to create a game of tic-tac-toe and today I study to solve others problems!
